# tf.no_op

Does nothing. Only useful as a placeholder for control edges.

### Aliases:

* `tf.compat.v1.no_op`
* `tf.compat.v2.no_op`
* `tf.no_op`

``` python
tf.no_op(name=None)
```



Defined in generated file: `python/ops/gen_control_flow_ops.py`.

The created Operation.
